text: @RealJamesWoods Really James? Yes we ARE in the middle of a crisis. Yes the worlds media has stopped political coverage. It’s called responsible journalism. Why not ask where Sanders is? Truth is Trump is afraid of Biden so you Trumpsters attack him while he allows COVID19 to be our focus.
